title: Koukaku Kidoutai: Stand Alone Complex 2nd GIG - Tachikoma na Hibi
original_name: 攻殻機動隊 STAND ALONE COMPLEX
sinopse: Tachikomatic Days is a series of comedic shorts attached to the end of every episode of Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex 2nd GIG. The shorts feature the antics of the Tachikoma think tanks of Section 9 and usually involve plot points. The average short time is a little over a minute.
